title: Thoughts on Andy Ngo, Violence and the Virtues of Peaceful Protest
description:
My thoughts on the attack on journalist Andy Ngo. I have been thinking this for a few days now, because I do not want to ad to outrage or polarization. This type of violence should not be tolerated by either side of the political spectrum, I talk about my concern for the justifications I am seeing as to why violence against Andy was ok, and why I think peaceful protest is the better way.

Follow me:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com

that's why martyrs gained giant follow
because it speaks to our human spirit
when you are above the violence and I

better
like in intrinsically we know it's the
